author: stack
msg: HADOOP-1737 Make HColumnDescriptor data publically members settable
Use new HColumnDescriptor accessors rather than make direct accesses
Use enum ordinals instead. Removed mapping between these defines and
enum equivalents. Made data members private and added accessors.
Fix because enum strings are upper-case (was expecting lowercase).

author: jdillon
msg: Pick up some jars from lib/* for now to save on some space

author: andreas
msg: Introduce Persistable interface. This allows to save complex objects (meta data, site tree) only once before the session is committed. Optimistic usecases lock their nodes before the usecase is executed (see bug 43136).
